value.name: tiat (the intersection of art & technology)
value.description:
About Event

​​a very special edition of tiat salons, this one is at the asian art museum!

​[more details tbd]

​come see a lineup of demos at the intersection of art & technology from creative technologists in the asian diaspora! talks will be short, 5 minutes each and are personal projects, no startups/companies :~)

​​​​each salon is curated to show varying practices at the intersection of art & technology. interested in demoing? let us know here, we'll reach out and confirm before the event.

​​

​​--

​​​tiat ​is the intersection of art and technology! we are a 501c3 nonprofit for creative technologists to experiment, exhibit, and expand their practice. ⋆౨ৎ˚⟡˖

​​we also just got our own space in Union Square, come see the gallery and come to more art & tech events https://luma.com/tiat

​​tiat website: https://tiat.place/

​​tiat ig: https://www.instagram.com/tiat.place
